sentences.en: Attaching the blower, dust separation plant , recycle directly, no need the operator.
sentences.cn: 附加小型吹风机 、 粉尘分离装置, 直接回收, 不经人手.

sentences.en: Chemical constantly circulate or recycle in the system.
sentences.cn: 化学物质在系统中不断循环或回流.

sentences.en: For many of the products we use, we are able to recycle.
sentences.cn: 我们有很多用过的东西是可回收的.

sentences.en: In addition , prospects for recycle of used refractories are also discussed.
sentences.cn: 扼要介绍了用后耐火材料再生利用的设想.

sentences.en: It is in our own best interest to recycle.
sentences.cn: 资源回收对我们是最有利的.

sentences.en: Jiuzhaigou is equipped with environment - friendly restrooms and recycle bins.
sentences.cn: 九寨沟配备了友好环境休息室和可回收箱.

sentences.en: Our newly designed ships can recycle 98 % of the shipping building materials.
sentences.cn: 我们设计的新型船舶可回收98%的造船材料.

sentences.en: Sort loose papers into piles: file, shred, and recycle.
sentences.cn: 将散页分类整理成堆: “文件” 、 “废物”以及“回收利用”.

sentences.en: Sulfur recycle catalyst activeness decline reason and its preventive measures are analyzed.
sentences.cn: 摘要分析了硫磺回收催化剂活性衰退的原因及防止措施.

sentences.en: The fashion world just keeps recycling old ideas.
sentences.cn: 时装界就是不停地翻新旧观念。

sentences.en: The objective would be to recycle 98 percent of domestic waste.
sentences.cn: 该目标是循环使用98%的生活垃圾。

sentences.en: The power of the Green movement in Germany has made that country a leader in the drive to recycle more waste materials.
sentences.cn: 德国环保运动的影响力使得该国率先发起了回收利用更多废品的运动。

sentences.en: The process of recycle system of chloropropene around the innovation were analysed.
sentences.cn: 分析了氯丙烯回收系统改造前后的工艺情况.

sentences.en: The scientist is making a research on how to recycle disposable products.
sentences.cn: 这位科学家正在研究如何回收利用一次性产品.

sentences.en: The services in the PC Recycle System are implemented by Web Services.
sentences.cn: 计算机回收信息系统中服务的实现采用Web服务(WebService).

sentences.en: The sole reason the Recycle Bin exists is to implement an undo facility for deleted files.
sentences.cn: 回收站存在的唯一理由就是实现文件删除的撤销工具.

sentences.en: We take all our bottles to be recycled.
sentences.cn: 我们把我们所有的瓶子都回收利用。

sentences.en: We've been working on this recycle project for more than 10 years.
sentences.cn: 从以前到现在我们已经为了这个回收计画努力了超过10年以上.

words.tran_cn: 可回收利用的；可再循环的
回收；再循环利用（recycle的现在分词）

trans.tran_en: to put used objects or materials through a special process so that they can be used again
If you recycle things that have already been used, such as bottles or sheets of paper, you process them so that they can be used again
to put used objects or materials through a special process so that they can be used again
